<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Attr = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/pseudoprobedwarfdiscriminator/#a87b1baf4f84945b1e2ef2366d0d14dad">PseudoProbeDwarfDiscriminator::extractProbeAttributes</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><Highlight kind="normal">            Discriminator);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> DwarfBaseDiscriminator =</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><Highlight kind="normal">                Discriminator);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Round small factors to 0 to avoid over-counting.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><Highlight kind="normal">        uint32&#95;t IntFactor =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><Highlight kind="normal">            <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/pseudoprobedwarfdiscriminator/#a0d966c8251ff32615370f3658cec6887">PseudoProbeDwarfDiscriminator::FullDistributionFactor</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><Highlight kind="normal">        uint32&#95;t V = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/pseudoprobedwarfdiscriminator/#a65b110861bfbc06e20befde65915f078">PseudoProbeDwarfDiscriminator::packProbeData</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>
